original_text: So, son of man, you must speak to Israel's people. Tell them, “This is what the Almighty Lord says: Your ancestors insulted me when they did not serve me faithfully.
korean_text: 그런즉 인자야 이스라엘 족속에게 말하여 이르라 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 너희 조상들이 또 내게 범죄하여 나를 욕되게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: you must speak to Israel's people
This is what the Almighty Lord says
when they did not serve me faithfully
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 충성스럽게 섬기지 않았을 때
